Html:
Hi,

I was hoping to incorporate this into a small Windows Mobile 5 app that I am writing and was wondering if you have a version of the library compiled for Windows Mobile 5?

 

Cheers,

 

Rees

Hi,

We've uploaded a version of the GeoUtility Library for the .NET Compact Framwork 2.0 and also added a little demo app for Windows Mobile 5 (see downloads). This demo app transforms coordinates from latitude/longitude to other coordinate systems and downloads a satellite image for this coordinate.

Please note: This version for the .NET Compact Framwork is not very well tested but it should do the job. If you find any bugs, please feel free to post it into the issue tracker.

Regards.
